item.description: I am currently a Research Scientist at Facebook AI. Before that I was a doctoral researcher in the Natural Language Processing Group at Heidelberg University and Research Training Group “AIPHES” where I worked on incorporating external knowledge into neural networks for question answering and reading comprehension. In Spring 2018 I was a Research Intern at the AI2 Aristo Team in Seattle. In Summer 2017 I was a Research Scientist Intern at Amazon AI in Palo Alto.
